comments.html: In my opinion there are 4 (amateur) comedians in this podcast talking about recycling old network technologies and mixing them together. The end result is a hexagonal wheel which will eventually work but it's not clear for now. For people who want to learn something new, they can skip to 55:07
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
Yeah, I probably should have pulled the plug on this one... but I thought there was still some pretty useful information in there regardless of how it sounds (and trust me, herding the cats would be easier).

Lesson learned...
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Fair enough. Looking forward to your new episode.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: Well, the podcast did answer two of my questions I posted for the upcoming Next-Gen DC course, so it was useful (and a bit of fun) to me :-)
comments.name: Daniel Verlouw

comments.html: I can't take this talk serious. For me it's too much giggling. I wonder what Ivan and his friends had consumed before the recording.
comments.name: Anonymous
